title: PM grieved over demise of renowned singer Shaukat Ali
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 2 (APP):Prime Minister Imran Khan on Friday expressed his deep grief and sorrow over the sad demise of renowned singer Shaukat Ali.
He prayed for elevation of the departed soul to high ranks and for fortitude to the grieved family.
The Prime Minister said that the services of late Shaukat Ali in the field of singing in the country will always be remembered.
